title: Sean Connery
text:
Sir Thomas Séan Connery (babar 25 Agustus 1930 di kota Edinburgh, Skotlandia - 2020, leuwih terkenal ku sebatan Séan Connery) mangrupa saorang aktor film jeung TV asal ti Skotlandia, Britania Raya. Anjeunna terkenal sabagai pameran James Bond pertama. Sampai ka kiwari, Connery parantos maen dina tujuh film James Bond, dimimitian dina "Dr. No" taun 1962 dan diahiri dina "Never Say Never Again" taun 1983.
Di luar James Bond, Connnery mangrupa saorang aktor handal. Anjeunna parantos meunang macam-macam panghargaan sapertos Academy Award, Golden Globe, jeung BAFTA Award. Sasih Juli 2000, Connery ngadapetkeun gelar ksatria kahormatan ti Ratu Elizabeth II.

title: George Lazenby
text:
Géorge Robert Lazenby (babar 5 September 1939 di Queanbeyan, New South Wales, Australia) mangrupa saorang aktor film sareng tilas modél asal Australia. Anjeunna terkenal sabagai salah sahiji pameran resmi James Bond, tepatnya dina film "On Her Majesty's Service" di taun 1969.
Sampai ka kiwari, Lazenby janten hiji-hijina aktor James Bond anu asalna sanes ti Britania Raya (Inggris, Skotlandia, Wales, Irlandia Utara, termasuk ogé Republik Irlandia). Salian dina film James Bond, Lazenby ogé muncul dina film-film laga anu dibintangan ku aktor Hong Kong, Bruce Lee sareng Raymond Chow.

title: Roger Moore
text:
Sir Roger Géorge Moore (14 Oktober 1927 – 23 Mei 2017) mangrupa saorang aktor film sareng televisi asal Inggris. Anjeunna terkenal dina dua peran detektif fiksi, nyaéta Simon Templar dina serial TV "The Saint", sareng sabagai pameran resmi James Bond katilu ti mimiti film "Live and Let Die" di taun 1973 sampai ka "A View to a Kill" di taun 1985.
Taun 1999 Roger Moore meunang penghargaan "Commander of the Order of the British Empire" (CBE) jeung di taun 2003 anjeunna meunang penghargaan "Knight Commander of the Order of the British Empire". Kadua penghargaan tadi dipasihan ku Ratu Elizabeth II.
Ti mimiti taun 1991 sampai ka anjeunna tilar dunya di 2017, Roger Moore ogé aktif di dunia amal, di mana anjeunna janten duta UNICEF.

title: Timothy Dalton
text: Timothy Peter Dalton (alias Timothy Dalton, akrab ku sebatan Timmy, babar di Colwyn Bay, Wales, UK kaping 21 Maret 1946) mangrupa saorang aktor film asal Wales. Anjeunna dikenal sabagai salah sahiji aktor resmi film James Bond dina "The Living Daylights" (1987) jeung "Licence to Kill" (1989). Anjeunna ogé terkenal ku peranna dia sababaraha hiji seri film sareng seri drama téater Shakespearean.

title: Pierce Brosnan
text: Pierce Brendan Brosnan, OBE () mangrupa saurang aktor pilem jeung tipi, produser pilem sarta aktivis lingkungan hidup, anu ayeuna nyekelan dua kewarganegaraan, nyaéta Irlandia jeung Amerika. Anjeunna kasohor salaku salah sahiji pameran resmi James Bond dina opat seri film, nyaéta "GoldenEye", "Tomorrow Never Dies", "The World Is Not Enough" jeung "Die Another Day".

title: Mercedes Grand Prix
text:
Mercedes GP nyaéta salah sahiji tim nu ngiluan ajang balap mobil Formula hiji mulai ti taun 2010. Tim ieu asalna nyaéta tim Brawn GP nu jadi juara konstruktor F1 2009 sakaligus mawa pembalapna Jenson Button jadi juara dunia pembalap F1 2009.
Dina sasih November 2009, pabrikan mobil ti Jerman, Mercedes ngumumkeun yén perusahaanana geus meuli kapimilikan perusahaan Brawn GP, nu hartina ti mimiti taun 2010, tim Brawn GP bakal robah janten Mercedes GP.
Mercedes sareng hiji perusahaan investasi Abu Dhabi diyakini tos meser 75 persen kapamilikan sahan tim Brawn GP, meskipun kitu Ross Brawn, pamingpin tim di taun 2009 bakal tetep ngajabat posisina. Isu nu santer nyatakeun yén Mercedes moal mempertahankeun juara dunia 2009 Jenson Button di timna taun 2010, tapi bakal ngagunakeun 2 pembalap jerman nyaéta Nico Rosberg sareng Nick Heidfeld.

title: Lewis Hamilton
text:
Lewis Hamilton (babar di Stevenage, Inggris, 7 Januari 1985), nyaéta salah sahiji pembalap dina ajang balap Formula 1. manéhna nyandang gelar Juara pembalap Formula 1 taun 2008 waktos nyupiran mobil tim McLaren.
Karir F1.
mimiti tampil di ajang F1 taun 2007, waktos McLaren ngumumkeun susunan pembalapna, manéhna waktos éta berpasangan sareng Juara Dunia pembalap sateuacanna Fernando Alonso, janten pembalap utama McLaren di taun 2007. Dina klasemen akhir pembalap, Hamilton nempatan posisi runner up ngan éléh hiji poin ti juara dunia taun éta Kimi Raikkonen ti Ferrari.
Taun 2008, Fernando Alonso kaluar ti tim McLaren balik deui ka Renault, ku sabab manéhna kuciwa jeung ngarasa dianaktirikeun ku McLaren, tim akhirna milih Heikki Kovalainen ti Finlandia pikeun maturan Hamilton janten pembalap utama McLaren. Taun ieu mangrupa puncak karir Hamilton, ku sabab di taun ieu anjeunna ngaraih gelar Juara dunia pembalap taun 2008 ngéléhkeun Felipe Massa ti Ferrari ogé ngan unggul 1 poin saatos berhasil lebet finish di posisi ka 5 di GP Brazil. Hasil ieu nyieun anjeunna nyetak sejarah janten Pembalap Formula 1 termuda nu bisa janten juara dunia pembalap nu sateuacanna dicepeng ku Fernando Alonso.
Taun 2009, anjeunna berpartisipasi nyandang gelar sebagai juara bertahan F1. Namun hanjakal performa mesin Mercedes McLaren teu mampu nyaingan performa mesin Mercedesna Brawn GP jeung Renaultna RBR di awal awal musim, hal ieu nyebabkeun Hamilton teu tiasa mertahankeun gelarna jeung kapaksa mung nempatan urutan 5 di klasemen akhir pangkereun Jenson Button, Sebastian Vettel, Rubens Barrichello sareng Mark Webber.

title: Nexian G922
text:
Nexian G922 mangrupa varian telepon seluler kaluaran Nexian ti Cina. mimiti diperkenalkeun taun 2009, bentuk fisikna selintas nurutan modél Blackberry nu kaluaran RIM ti Kanada.
Nexian G922 mangrupa ponsel bundling Telkomsel di Indonesia, varian ieu mangrupa varian panganyarna ti Nexian seri G selain Nexian G900 (bundling XL) jeung Nexian G911 (bundling Indosat).

title: Telkomsel
text:
Telkomsel mangrupa salah sahiji parusahaan télékomunikasi seluler di Indonésia. Telkomsel ogé mangrupa anak perusahaan ti PT. Telkom Indonésia. Posisi Telkomsel ayeuna nyaéta operator seluler paling gedé di Indonésia ditingali tina jumlah pelanggan ku sabab sukses ngahontal 72 juta pelanggan.
Sajarah.
Operasional Telkomsel dimimitian tanggal 26 Mei 1995, Telkomsel dibentuk tina patungan saham anatara PT. Telkom jeung PT. Indosat.
Taun 1997, Telkomsel jadi operator seluler munggaran di wilayah Asia jeung di dunya, nu ngawanohkeun layanan telepon seluler pra bayar. Dina taun 1998, Telkomsel sukses ngajadikeun manéhna pausahaan telepon seluler nomer hiji di Indonesia, ditingali tina jumlah pamake kartuna.

title: CDMA
text:
Code division multiple access (CDMA) is a channel access method utilized by various radio communication technologies. It should not be confused with the mobile phone standards called cdmaOne and CDMA2000 (which are often referred to as simply "CDMA"), which use CDMA as an underlying channel access method.
One of the basic concepts in data communication is the idéa of allowing several transmitters to send information simultanéously over a single communication channel. This allows several users to share a bandwidth of different frequencies. This concept is called multiplexing. CDMA employs spread-spectrum technology and a special coding scheme (where éach transmitter is assigned a code) to allow multiple users to be multiplexed over the same physical channel. By contrast, time division multiple access (TDMA) divides access by time, while frequency-division multiple access (FDMA) divides it by frequency. CDMA is a form of "spread-spectrum" signaling, since the modulated coded signal has a much higher data bandwidth than the data being communicated.
An analogy to the problem of multiple access is a room (channel) in which péople wish to communicate with éach other. To avoid confusion, péople could take turns spéaking (time division), spéak at different pitches (frequency division), or spéak in different languages (code division). CDMA is analogous to the last example where péople spéaking the same language can understand éach other, but not other péople. Similarly, in radio CDMA, éach group of users is given a shared code. Many codes occupy the same channel, but only users associated with a particular code can understand éach other.
Tahap dina modulasi CDMA.
CDMA is a spréad spectrum multiple access technique. A spréad spectrum technique is one which spréads the bandwidth of the data uniformly for the same transmitted power. Spréading code is a pseudo-random code which has a narrow Ambiguity function unlike other narrow pulse codes. In CDMA a locally generated code runs at a much higher rate than the data to be transmitted. Data for transmission is simply logically XOR (exclusive OR) added with the faster code. The figure shows how spréad spectrum signal is generated. The data signal with pulse duration of formula_1 is XOR added with the code signal with pulse duration of formula_2. (Note: bandwidth is proportional to formula_3 where formula_4 = bit time) Therefore, the bandwidth of the data signal is formula_5 and the bandwidth of the spréad spectrum signal is formula_6. Since formula_2 is much smaller than formula_1, the bandwidth of the spréad spectrum signal is much larger than the bandwidth of the original signal. The ratio formula_9 is called spréading factor or processing gain and determines to certain extent the upper limit of total number of users supported simultanéously by a base station
éach user in a CDMA system uses a different code to modulate their signal. Choosing the codes used to modulate the signal is very important in the performance of CDMA systems. The best performance will occur when there is good separation between the signal of a desired user and the signals of other users. The separation of the signals is made by correlating the received signal with the locally generated code of the desired user. If the signal matches the desired user's code then the correlation function will be high and the system can extract that signal. If the desired user's code has nothing in common with the signal the correlation should be as close to zero as possible (thus eliminating the signal); this is referred to as cross correlation. If the code is correlated with the signal at any time offset other than zero, the correlation should be as close to zero as possible. This is referred to as auto-correlation and is used to reject multi-path interference.
In general, CDMA belongs to two basic categories: synchronous (orthogonal codes) and asynchronous (pseudorandom codes).
Code Division Multiplexing ("Synchronous" CDMA).
Synchronous CDMA exploits mathematical properties of orthogonality between vectors representing the data strings. For example, binary string "1011" is represented by the vector (1, 0, 1, 1). Vectors can be multiplied by taking their dot product, by summing the products of their respective components. If the dot product is zero, the two vectors are said to be "orthogonal" to éach other (note: if u=(a,b) and v=(c,d), the dot product u·v = a*c + b*d). Some properties of the dot product aid understanding of how W-CDMA works. If vectors "a" and "b" are orthogonal, then
éach user in synchronous CDMA uses a code orthogonal to the others' codes to modulate their signal. An example of four mutually orthogonal digital signals is shown in the figure. Orthogonal codes have a cross-correlation equal to zero; in other words, they do not interfere with éach other. In the case of IS-95 64 bit Walsh codes are used to encode the signal to separate different users. Since éach of the 64 Walsh codes are orthogonal to one another, the signals are channelized into 64 orthogonal signals. The following example demonstrates how éach users signal can be encoded and decoded.
Conto.
Start with a set of vectors that are mutually orthogonal. (Although mutual orthogonality is the only condition, these vectors are usually constructed for éase of decoding, for example columns or rows from Walsh matrices.) An example of orthogonal functions is shown in the picture on the left. These vectors will be assigned to individual users and are called the "code", "chipping code" or "chip code". In the interest of brevity, the rest of this example uses codes (v) with only 2 digits.
éach user is associated with a different code, say v. If the data to be transmitted is a digital zero, then the actual bits transmitted will be –v, and if the data to be transmitted is a digital one, then the actual bits transmitted will be v. For example, if v=(1,–1), and the data that the user wishes to transmit is (1, 0, 1, 1) this would correspond to (v, –v, v, v) which is then constructed in binary as ((1,–1),(–1,1),(1,–1),(1,–1)). For the purposes of this article, we call this constructed vector the "transmitted vector".
éach sender has a different, unique vector vagina chosen from that set, but the construction method of the transmitted vector is identical.
Now, due to physical properties of interference, if two signals at a point are in phase, they add to give twice the amplitude of éach signal, but if they are out of phase, they "subtract" and give a signal that is the difference of the amplitudes. Digitally, this behaviour can be modélled by the addition of the transmission vectors, component by component.
If sender0 has code (1,–1) and data (1,0,1,1), and sender1 has code (1,1) and data (0,0,1,1), and both senders transmit simultanéously, then this table describes the coding steps:
Because signal0 and signal1 are transmitted at the same time into the air, they add to produce the raw signal:
This raw signal is called an interference pattern. The receiver then extracts an intelligible signal for any known sender by combining the sender's code with the interference pattern, the receiver combines it with the codes of the senders. The following table explains how this works and shows that the signals do not interfere with one another:
Further, after decoding, all values gréater than 0 are interpreted as 1 while all values less than zero are interpreted as 0. For example, after decoding, data0 is (2,–2,2,2), but the receiver interprets this as (1,0,1,1).
We can also consider what would happen if a receiver tries to decode a signal when the user has not sent any information. Assume signal0=(1,-1,-1,1,1,-1,1,-1) is transmitted alone. The following table shows the decode at the receiver:
When the receiver attempts to decode the signal using sender1’s code, the data is all zeros, therefore the cross correlation is equal to zero and it is cléar that sender1 did not transmit any data.
Asynchronous CDMA.
The previous example of orthogonal Walsh sequences describes how 2 users can be multiplexed together in a synchronous system, a technique that is commonly referred to as Code Division Multiplexing (CDM). The set of 4 Walsh sequences shown in the figure will afford up to 4 users, and in general, an NxN Walsh matrix can be used to multiplex N users. Multiplexing requires all of the users to be coordinated so that éach transmits their assigned sequence v (or the complement, -v) so that they arrive at the receiver at exactly the same time. Thus, this technique finds use in base-to-mobile links, where all of the transmissions originate from the same transmitter and can be perfectly coordinated.
On the other hand, the mobile-to-base links cannot be precisely coordinated, particularly due to the mobility of the handsets, and require a somewhat different approach. Since it is not mathematically possible to créate signature sequences that are orthogonal for arbitrarily random starting points, unique "pseudo-random" or "pseudo-noise" (PN) sequences are used in "Asynchronous" CDMA systems. A PN code is a binary sequence that appéars random but can be reproduced in a deterministic manner by intended receivers. These PN codes are used to encode and decode a user's signal in Asynchronous CDMA in the same manner as the orthogonal codes in synchronous CDMA (shown in the example above). These PN sequences are statistically uncorrelated, and the sum of a large number of PN sequences results in Multiple Access Interference (MAI) that is approximated by a Gaussian noise process (following the "central limit theorem" in statistics). If all of the users are received with the same power level, then the variance (e.g., the noise power) of the MAI incréases in direct proportion to the number of users. In other words, unlike synchronous CDMA, the signals of other users will appéar as noise to the signal of interest and interfere slightly with the desired signal in proportion to number of users.
All forms of CDMA use spread spectrum process gain to allow receivers to partially discriminate against unwanted signals. Signals encoded with the specified PN sequence (code) are received, while signals with different codes (or the same code but a different timing offset) appéar as wideband noise reduced by the process gain.
Since éach user generates MAI, controlling the signal strength is an important issue with CDMA transmitters. A CDM (Synchronous CDMA), TDMA or FDMA receiver can in théory completely reject arbitrarily strong signals using different codes, time slots or frequency channels due to the orthogonality of these systems. This is not true for Asynchronous CDMA; rejection of unwanted signals is only partial. If any or all of the unwanted signals are much stronger than the desired signal, they will overwhelm it. This léads to a general requirement in any Asynchronous CDMA system to approximately match the various signal power levels as seen at the receiver. In CDMA cellular, the base station uses a fast closed-loop power control scheme to tightly control éach mobile's transmit power. See Near-far problem for further information on this problem.
Advantages of Asynchronous CDMA over other techniques.
1. Efficient Practical utilization of Fixed Frequency Spectrum
Asynchronous CDMA's main advantage over CDM ("Synchronous" CDMA), TDMA and FDMA is that it can use the spectrum more efficiently in mobile telephony applications. ("In theory, CDMA, TDMA and FDMA have exactly the same spectral efficiency but practically, each has its own challenges – power control in the case of CDMA, timing in the case of TDMA, and frequency generation/filtering in the case of FDMA.") 
TDMA systems must carefully synchronize the transmission times of all the users to ensure that they are received in the correct timeslot and do not cause interference. Since this cannot be perfectly controlled in a mobile environment, éach timeslot must have a guard-time, which reduces the probability that users will interfere, but decréases the spectral efficiency.
Similarly, FDMA systems must use a guard-band between adjacent channels, due to the unpredictable doppler shift of the signal spectrum which occurs due to the user's mobility. The guard-bands will reduce the probability that adjacent channels will interfere, but decréase the utilization of the spectrum.
2. Flexible Allocation of Resources
Asynchronous CDMA offers a key advantage in the flexible allocation of resources i.e. allocation of a PN codes to active users. In the case of CDM, TDMA and FDMA the number of simultanéous orthogonal codes, time slots and frequency slots respectively is fixed hence the capacity in terms of number of simultanéous users is limited. There are a fixed number of orthogonal codes, timeslots or frequency bands that can be allocated for CDM, TDMA and FDMA systems, which remain underutilized due to the bursty nature of telephony and packetized data transmissions. There is no strict limit to the number of users that can be supported in an "Asynchronous" CDMA system, only a practical limit governed by the desired bit error probability, since the SIR (Signal to Interference Ratio) varies inversely with the number of users. In a bursty traffic environment like mobile telephony, the advantage afforded by Asynchronous CDMA is that 
the performance (bit error rate) is allowed to fluctuate randomly, with an average value determined by the number of users times the percentage of utilization. Suppose there are 2N users that only talk half of the time, then 2N users can be accommodated with the same "average" bit error probability as N users that talk all of the time. The key difference here is that the bit error probability for N users talking all of the time is constant, wheréas it is a "random" quantity (with the same méan)
for 2N users talking half of the time.
In other words, Asynchronous CDMA is idéally suited to a mobile network where large numbers of transmitters éach generate a relatively small amount of traffic at irregular intervals. CDM ("Synchronous" CDMA), TDMA and FDMA systems cannot recover the underutilized resources inherent to bursty traffic due to the fixed number of orthogonal codes, time slots or frequency channels that can be assigned to individual transmitters. For instance, if there are N time slots in a TDMA system and 2N users that talk half of the time, then half of the time there will be more than N users needing to use more than N timeslots. Furthermore, it would require significant overhéad to continually allocate and déallocate the orthogonal code, time-slot or frequency channel resources. By comparison, Asynchronous CDMA transmitters simply send when they have something to say, and go off the air when they don't, keeping the same PN signature sequence as long as they are connected to the system.
3. Privacy protection in Spréad Spectrum CDMA due to anti-jamming (Anjing) capabilities of PN sequences
Panyebaran spektrum karakteristik CDMA.
Most modulation schemes try to minimize the bandwidth of this signal since bandwidth is a limited resource. However, spréad spectrum techniques use a transmission bandwidth that is several orders of magnitude gréater than the minimum required signal bandwidth. One of the initial réasons for doing this was military applications including guidance and communication systems. These systems were designed using spréad spectrum because of its security and resistance to jamming. Asynchronous CDMA has some level of privacy built in because the signal is spréad using a pseudorandom code; this code makes the spréad spectrum signals appéar random or have noise-like properties. A receiver cannot demodulate this transmission without knowledge of the pseudorandom sequence used to encode the data. CDMA is also resistant to jamming. A jamming signal only has a finite amount of power available to jam the signal. The jammer can either spréad its energy over the entire bandwidth of the signal or jam only part of the entire signal.
CDMA can also effectively reject narrowband interference. Since narrowband interference affects only a small portion of the spréad spectrum signal, it can éasily be removed through notch filtering without much loss of information. Convolution encoding and interleaving can be used to assist in recovering this lost data. CDMA signals are also resistant to multipath fading. Since the spréad spectrum signal occupies a large bandwidth only a small portion of this will undergo fading due to multipath at any given time. Like the narrowband interference this will result in only a small loss of data and can be overcome.
Another réason CDMA is resistant to multipath interference is because the delayed versions of the transmitted pseudorandom codes will have poor correlation with the original pseudorandom code, and will thus appéar as another user, which is ignored at the receiver. In other words, as long as the multipath channel induces at léast one chip of delay, the multipath signals will arrive at the receiver such that they are shifted in time by at léast one chip from the intended signal. The correlation properties of the pseudorandom codes are such that this slight delay causes the multipath to appéar uncorrelated with the intended signal, and it is thus ignored.
Some CDMA devices use a rake receiver, which exploits multipath delay components to improve the performance of the system.
A rake receiver combines the information from several correlators, éach one tuned to a different path delay, producing a stronger version of the signal than a simple receiver with a single correlator tuned to the path delay of the strongest signal.
Frequency reuse is the ability to reuse the same radio channel frequency at other cell sites within a cellular system. In the FDMA and TDMA systems frequency planning is an important consideration. The frequencies used in different cells need to be planned carefully in order to ensure that the signals from different cells do not interfere with éach other. In a CDMA system the same frequency can be used in every cell because channelization is done using the pseudorandom codes. Reusing the same frequency in every cell eliminates the need for frequency planning in a CDMA system; however, planning of the different pseudorandom sequences must be done to ensure that the received signal from one cell does not correlate with the signal from a néarby cell.
Since adjacent cells use the same frequencies, CDMA systems have the ability to perform soft handoffs. Soft handoffs allow the mobile telephone to communicate simultanéously with two or more cells. The best signal quality is selected until the handoff is complete. This is different from hard handoffs utilized in other cellular systems. In a hard handoff situation, as the mobile telephone approaches a handoff, signal strength may vary abruptly. In contrast, CDMA systems use the soft handoff, which is undetectable and provides a more reliable and higher quality signal.

title: Indosat
text: Indosat mangrupa salah sahiji pausahaan telekomunikasi di Indonésia.

title: Bumblebee
text:
Bumblebee mangrupa nami keur salah sahiji karakter fiksi tina serial The Transformers. Dirina mangrupa salah sahiji anggota tim Autobots pimpinan Optimus Prime. Bumblebee janten salah sahiji karakter seri Transformers anu paling dikenal ku masyarakat dunia salian ti Optimus Prime atanapi Megatron.
Dina seri Transformers G1 Bumblebee tiasa robih janten mobil VW Beetle, samentara dina seri Transformers film 2007 jeung 2009 modél Bumblebee nyaéta mobil Chevrolet Camaro edisi 1976/2009.
Dina serial , Bumblebee tiasa robih janten mobil polisi koneng anu mirip Toyota Yaris.

title: Megatron
text: Megatron mangrupa nami keur salah sahiji karakter fiksi tina serial The Transformers. Anjeunna mangrupa pamimpin paling luhur ti Decepticons, nu mangrupa sabuah grup penjahat dina serial ieu. Ngarujuk kana majalah Wizard, Megatron nempatan posisi ka-68 tina daftar penjahat sareng dictator paling legendaries di dunia. Musuh utamana nyaéta Optimus Prime ti Autobots.

title: Nicolas Hülkenberg
text:
Nicolas Hulkenberg (babar di Emmerich am Rhein, Jerman kaping 19 Agustus 1987) mangrupa saorang pembalap Formula 1 anu asalna ti Jerman. Ayeuna anjeunna ngagabung sareng tim Williams-Cosworth.
Sateuacan lebet ka F1, Hulkenberg mangrupa saorang pembalap junior anu sukses. Dirina pernah janten juara GP2 musim 2009, juara umum A1GP musim 2006-07, jeung juara F3 Euroseries di taun 2008.
Manajer Nico Hulkenberg anu ayeuna nyaéta tilas manajer Michael Schumacher, Willi Weber. Hulkenberg bakal berpasangan sareng pembalap senior Rubens Barrichello di F1 musim 2010.

title: Bruno Senna
text: Bruno Senna Lalli (babar 15 Oktober 1983 di Sao Paulo, Brazil) mangrupa saorang pembalap Formula 1 anu asalna ti Brazil. Ayeuna anjeunna ngagabung sareng tim Campos Grand Prix. Senna mangrupa kaponakan ti pembalap F1 legendaris Brazil, Ayrton Senna anu tilar dunya di San Marino taun 1994.

title: Mark Webber
text:
Mark Alan Webber (babar di Queanbeyan, New South Wales, Australia kaping 27 Agustus 1976) mangrupa saorang pembalap Formula 1 anu asalna ti Australia. Ayeuna dirina ngagabung sareng tim Red Bull Racing, berpasangan sareng Sebastian Vettel.
Webber ngamimitian debut F1-na di GP Australia 2002 sareng tim Minardi. Podium pertamana diraih di GP Monaco 2005 di mana anjeunna nempatan posisi katilu. Kamenangan perdanana diraih di GP Jerman 2009. Sampai ka kiwari, posisi terbaik Webber di F1 nyaéta nempatan posisi kaopat klasemen di F1 musim 2009.

title: Timo Glock
text:
Timo Glock (babar kaping 18 Maret 1982 di Lindenfels, Jerman) mangrupa saorang pembalap Formula 1 anu asalna ti Jerman. Musim 2010 engke, anjeunna bakal ngagabung sareng tim Manor Grand Prix. Sateuacan ka Manor, Glock sempet ngagabung di tim Toyota ti mimiti musim 2008. Debut Glock di F1 dimimitian di GP Kanada 2004 di mana anjeunna ngagabung sareng tim Jordan GP.
Di ajang junior, Timo Glock mangrupa juara GP2 Series musim 2007.

title: Rubens Barrichello
text:
Rubens Goncalves Barrichello (babar kaping 23 Mei 1972 di Sao Paulo, Brazil) mangrupa pembalap Formula 1 asal Brazil. Ayeuna dirina ngagabung sareng tim WilliamsF1.
Barrichello ngamimitian debutna di GP Afrika Selatan 1993 sareng tim Jordan Grand Prix. Ti dinya sampai ka ayeuna, dirina janten pembalap F1 paling berpengalaman, dengan jumlah start hamper ngadekeutan angka 300 kali. Barrichello kungsi ngagabung sareng tim Stewart Grand Prix jeung Scuderia Ferrari, di mana di Ferrari anjeunna leuwih loba janten pambantos Michael Schumacher.
Musim 2009 anjeunna ngagabung sareng tim Brawn GP. Dirina nyaris janten jawara dunya 2009, tapi gagal ku sabab loba masalah di babarapa balapan di akhir musim.

title: Nico Rosberg
text:
Nico Rosberg (babar 27 Juni 1985 di Wiesbaden, Jerman Kulon) nyaéta pembalap formula hiji nu di taun 2010 bakal ngabalap kanggo tim Mercedes GP.
Nico Rosberg mangrupa warga Jerman nu pernah ngabalap dibawah lambang Finlandia waktos budak, ku sabab anjeunna gaduh dua status kabangsaan nyaéta Jerman sareng Finlandia.
Kahirupan.
Nico Rosberg mangrupa anak ti Juara dunia Formula hiji taun 1982 Keke Rosberg sareng istrina Sina, anjeunna hirup ti leuleutik cicing di Monako sareng kaluwargana sampei ka ayeuna. Anjeunna ngabalap dibawah lambang Finlandia, tapi di Formula hiji anjeunna ngabela panji nagara Jerman.

title: Axis
XL Axiata
text:
XL Axiata mangrupa salah sahiji pausahaan di Indonésia nu muka layanan dina jaringan telepon seluler diadegkeun kaping 6 Oktober 1989 dina nami Grahametropolitan Lestari, nu usahana di bidang dagang sareng jasa umum.
Genep taun salajengna, pausahaan ieu gabung jeung pausahaan lain, NYNEX-AIF sareng Mitsui. Nami pausahaanna robih janten Excelcomindo Pratama dina bisnis utama anyarna nyaéta nyadiakeun layanan telpon.
Taun 1996, XL operasional sacara komsersil dina konsentrasi cakupan daérah di Jakarta, Bandung sareng Surabaya, ieu ngajadikeun XL janten pausahaan tertutup u mumule usaha di bidang telepon seluler.
Taun 2005, kagaduhan saham XL mayoritas dicepeng ku TM International Berhad liwat Indocel Holding Sdn. Bhd. sareng Emirates Telecommunications Corporation (Etisalat) liwat Etisalat International Indonésia Ltd.

title: 3 (telepon usik)
Telkom Indonesia
text:
Telkom Indonésia mangrupa salah sahiji Badan Usaha Milik Negara (BUMN) nu usahana dina widang panyadiaan jasa télékomunikasi, nyaéta télékomunikasi cicing sareng télékomunikasi usik di Indonesia.
Telkom mangrupa pausahaan telepon paling gedé di Indonesia, nu ngawasa pasar boh telepon imah (PSTN Telkom), GSM (liwat anak pausahaanna Telkomsel) atawa CDMA (liwat produkna Telkom Flexi).
Sajarah.
Telkom diwangun ti tanggal 23 Oktober 1856, dioperasikeunna layanan télékomunikasi nu mimiti di Indonésia dina bentuk kiriman telegraf ti Jakarta (waktos éta Batavia) ka Bogor (waktos éta Buitenzorg).
Parobahan pamungkas dina taun 2009 nyaéta New Telkom Indonésia, mangrupa transformasi (parobahan) dina bisnis, dina infrastruktur, dina sistem jeung modél operasi sarta parobahan sumber daya manusa. Resmina diluncurkeun dina kaping 23 Oktober 2009, waktos ulang taun Telkom nu ka 153.
Sampe 31 Desember 2008, pelanggan Telkom naek 37% ti taun sateuacanna nyaéta 86,6 juta pelanggan nu kabagi kana telepon tetep (PSTN) saloba 8,6 juta pelanggan, FWA 12,7 juta pelanggan sareng 65,3 juta pelanggan telepon usik.

title: Smartfren
text:
PT Smartfren Telecom Tbk atau smartfren (dahulu PT Mobile-8 Telecom Tbk atau Mobile-8) mangrupa salah sahiji pausahaan di Indonésia, nu bergerak dinu panyadiaan layanan telepon seluler dina basis CDMA sareng layanan Internet.
Sajarah.
Smartfren diadegkeun 2 Désémber 2002 nganggo merk Fren nu mangrupa singgetan tina ("Fast Reliable Enjoyable Network"). Dina tanggal 8 Désémber 2003 smartfren ngaluncurkeun layanan pra mayar CDMA na sareng pasca bayar tanggal 8 April 2004. Mobile-8 nawarkeun variasi layanan nu janten nilai tambah sareng program ngagunakeun teknologi CDMA 2000-1x nu bisa nyadiakeun sora nu leuwih jernih, saeutik dropcall sareng akses data leuwih cepet.

title: Pasifik Satelit Nusantara
text:
Pasifik Satelit Nusantara mangrupa hiji-hijina pausahaan di Indonésia nu muka layanan telepon satelit lewat merkna "Byru".
PT. Pasifik Satelit Nusantara atawa disingget PSN mangrupa pausahaan télékomunikasi satelit swasta munggaran nu aya di Indonésia sareng panyadia layanan satelit pangageungna sa-Asia nu nyadiakeun layanan télékomunikasi nu ngabasis dina satelit, kanggo seluler maupun kanggo telepon tetep.
Produk.
Layanan komunikasi bergerak nu ngabasis dina satelit nyadiakeun akses teu kawates kanggo komunikasi di Indonésia sareng wilayah Asia Pasifik, nganggo terminal nu ukuranna leutik sapertos telepon seluler.
Layanan komunikasi telepon tetep nu ngabasis dina satelit dilayani liwat instalasi terminal fixed terrestrial panganggo sareng nyadiakeun cakupan luas kamampuan tina telepon biasa dugi ke transmisi multimedia nu berkembang.

title: One Piece
text:
One Piece nyaéta salah sahiji judul manga jeung anime Jepang nu diciptakeun ku Eiichiro Oda dina kaping 24 Desember 1997.
One Piece mangrupa manga jenis shounen nu aslina diterbitkeun tiap mingguan dina majalah manga mingguan Weekly Shounen Jump.
Carita.
Carita dina One Piece dimulai waktos bajak laut terkenal nu ogé mangrupa Raja Bajak Laut Gol D. Roger bade dieksekusi ku pamaréntah dunia di kota Loguetown, Eastblue. Saacan dieksekusi, Roger ngungkapkeun yén manéhna nyimpen sakabéh harta kelompok manéhna nu disebut One Piece di hiji pulo nu ngaranna Raftel, nu lokasina aya di tungtung Grand Line.
20 taun nyelang di hiji pulo leutik ker berlabuh hiji kelompok Bajak Laut nu ngaranna Bajak Laut Rambut Beureum nu dipingpin ku Shanks, kelompok ieu dipikaresek tarutama pamingpinna ku hiji budak leutik nu ngaranna Monkey D. Luffy. Luffy nu ngidolakeun Shanks ngupayakeun manéhna supaya bisa ditarima jadi kru na Shanks. Rasa sayang Luffy ka Shanks nambah drastis waktos Luffy diculik ku Higuma terus dibawa jeung dialungkeun ka laut, manangkala rek didahar ku monster laut, Shanks datang nyalametkeun Luffy, meskipun Shanks kudu leungiteun leungeun kirina. Teu lila ti harita Shanks jeung anak buahna ninggalkeun désa, sateuacan indit manéhna méré topi nu jadi khasna nyaéta Topi Jarami nu engkena jadi ciri khas Luffy jeung kelompokna.
Sabaraha taun ti harita Luffy nu geus gedé, ngawujudkeun cita cita na janten Bajak Laut, manéhna pamit ti désa kanggo berpetualang ngurilingan dunia janten Bajak Laut demi ngengingkeun One Piece sareng janten Raja Bajak Laut berikutna.
Dina perjalanan ngawujudkeun ngimpina Luffy mulai ngumpulkeun babaturan kanggo janten kruna ti mimiti Roronoa Zoro, salah sahiji jago pedang nu profesina ogé nyaéta tukang ngaburu bajak laut janten tukang tarung, teras Nami, awewe tukang maling nu teu resep ka bajak laut janten navigator kapal, Usopp, lalaki tukang bohong jeung ngocoblak janten penembak jitu kapal, Sanji, lalaki jago masak nu beuki ka awewe janten koki kapal, Tony Tony Chopper nu mangrupa sakadang rusa nu bisa ngomong janten dokter kapal, Nico Robin, awewe pinter tapi misterius janten ahli arkéolog kapal, Franky, lalaki satengah cyborg janten Tukang Kayu kapal sareng Brook, lalaki nu geus jadi tangkorak tapi hirup deui janten musisi kapal.
Karakter.
Puluhan karakter muncul dina carita One Piece ieu, tapi karakter utamana fokus dina kru topi jarami jeung pihak Angkatan Laut ditambah bajak laut Shirohige jeung Kurohige.
Lokasi.
Carita dina One Piece nyokot seting lokasi di dunia khayalan one piece, antara lain :
Lalakon dina one piece.
luffy téh salah sahiji lalakon dina ieu carita, anjeunna téh gaduh kakuatan setan, antukna anjeunna tiasa manjangkeun sagalarupi bentuk awakna, luffy téh ngadamel bajak lau anu dinamian bajak laut topi jerami, anjeunna téh gaduh babaturan, babaturan anjeunna téh dugi ka ayeuna aya 8 jalmi. anjeunna téh gaduh angeun-angeun palay jadi bajak laut.
monkey d. luffy.
zorro téh nyaéta mangrupa salah sahiji babaturan luffy, manéhna papendak sareng luffy di hiji pulo nu aya di east blue, manéhna dibébas keun ku luffy tina salah sahiji tantara anu jagoan, zorro boga ka ahlian ngagunakeun pedang, sanes tinu lain anjeunna ngagunakeun 3 pedang sakaligus, dua pedang dina pangan saeng hiji deui na lambeuyna. 
nami papendak jeung luffy di hiji pulo nu aya di éast blue, anjeunna salah sahiji awewe nu aya di kapal na luffy, anjeunna ogé nyaéta navigator di kapal luffy
usop téh babaturan ka opat nu direkrut ku luffy, anjeunna direkrut di salas sahiji pulo nu aya di éast blue. di lembur asal na manéhna dijulukan buraong, atawa beuki ngawadul.
anjeunna téh babaturan ka lima nu direkrut ku luffy, anjeunna di rekruk ku luffy disalah sahiji restoran nyaéta baratie restoran nu aya di éast blue, anjeunna téh jago masak, anjeunna can pernah ngaggunakeun pananganana keur gelut ku sabab panaganana téh salah sahiji anugrah paling suci ti sim gusti.
anjeunna na téh babaturan ka genep luffy, profesi anjeunna téh nyaéta dokterna kapal di bajak laut topi jerami, anjeunna ngagaduhan buah setan anu tiasa ngarobah anjeunna jadi berbagai bentuk sato nu sanes
anjeunna na téh babaturan ka tujuh luffy, anjeunna téh di julukan si iblis ti pulo manéhna, manéhna gaduh kakuatan buah setan anu tiasa ngagandakeun tubuh anu mana wae.
anjeunna téh babaturan ka dalapan luffy, anjeunna téh terampil dina ngadamel kapal, anjeunna téh salah sahiji murid ti tom, anu ngadamel kapal oro jackson (kapal raja bajak laut)
Media.
Carita One Piece diputer dina sabaraha media nyaéta dina bentuk manga, anime jeung dina bentuk film lepas.
Manga.
Carita carita One Piece paling "up to date" ayana dina bentuk manga nu dimulai ti taun 1997, lumangsung dugi ka ayeuna. Dugi Oktober 2011, di Jepangna tos dirilis 63 volume manga One Piece (komik), samentara di Indonésia, rencanana bulan Desember 2009, bakal diterbitkeun volume ka 53.
Samentara menurut bab nu paling anyar nu diterbitkeun dina majalah Weekly Shonen Jump Shueisha, tos dugi ka bab 643 per tanggal 23 Oktober 2011.
Film.
Salapan film One Piece geus dirilis, film ka sapuluh bakal dirilis. Daftar film One Piece nyaéta :

title: Daptar karakter One Piece
text: Daptar karakter One Piece nu muncul mulai ti bab 1 nepi ka bab 565.

title: Daptar bab One Piece
Piala Dunia FIFA 2010
text:
Piala Dunia FIFA 2010 nyaéta Piala Dunia olahraga Sepakbola nu ka 19 kalina, nu bakal diayakeun di nagara Afrika Kidul.
Pamilihan.
Sahubungan regulasi FIFA nu ngatur yén nu janten tuan rumah Piala Dunia dilumangsungkeun sacara rotasi (muter) antar benua, benua Afrika kabagéan jatah janten tuan rumah Piala Dunia 2010, sahubungan hal ieu 5 nagara nyalonkeun janten tuan rumah nyaéta :
ku sabab FIFA ngalarang pangajuan tuan rumah bareng, nagara Tunisia mundur tina pencalonan, hal ieu 
nyababkeun pengajuan Libya nu janten partner tuan rumah bareng Tunisia, pencalonanna teu diwaru ku komite eksekutif FIFA. Dina pamilihan nu dilumangsungkeun tanggal 15 Mei 2004 di Zurich, Swiss. Afrika Kidul kapilih janten tuan rumah ngéléhkeun Mesir jeung Maroko.
